metadata.Title: CVE-2022-1115 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: A heap-buffer-overflow flaw was found in ImageMagickâ€™s PushShortPixel()function of quantum-private.h file. This vulnerability is triggered when anattacker passes a specially crafted TIFF image file to ImageMagick forconversion, potentially leading to a denial of service.

criterions.comment: imagemagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
